home.subtitle: Preserve and share Croatia's rich photographic heritage
home.description: Discover historical photographs from across Croatia. Share your own family photos and help preserve our cultural memory for future generations.

home.glimpseDesc: Browse through our collection of historical photos from various Croatian locations.
home.startJourneyDesc: Join our community and help preserve the visual history of Croatia for future generations.

about.title: About Vremeplov
about.subtitle: Preserving Croatian heritage, one memory at a time
about.missionText1: Vremeplov.hr is a digital platform dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich visual history of Croatian cities and villages. We believe that every photograph tells a story, and every story deserves to be preserved for future generations.
about.missionText2: Our mission is to create a comprehensive archive of historical photographs from across Croatia, making these precious memories accessible to everyone while fostering a deeper connection to our heritage.
about.digitalPreservationDesc: We provide a secure, digital home for historical photographs that might otherwise be lost to time.
about.localHistoryDesc: Each location gets its own dedicated space, creating comprehensive visual histories of Croatian places.
about.communityConnectionDesc: People can tag relatives, share stories, and connect with others who share their heritage.
about.culturalHeritageDesc: We help communities maintain their cultural identity by preserving visual memories.
about.developerText1: Vremeplov.hr was created by Kruno ≈Ωagar, a passionate developer committed to preserving Croatian heritage through technology. Understanding the importance of our cultural history and the risk of losing precious memories, Kruno developed this platform to ensure that future generations can explore and connect with their roots.
about.developerText2: This project represents a personal commitment to giving back to the community by providing a valuable service that helps preserve our shared cultural heritage.
about.getInvolvedText: Help us build the most comprehensive archive of Croatian historical photographs. Your contributions make a difference in preserving our heritage.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your data
privacy.dataCollectionText1: When you upload photos to Vremeplov.hr, we collect and store the following information:
privacy.dataCollectionList1: Historical photographs you choose to share
privacy.dataCollectionList3: Comments and tags you add to photos
privacy.dataCollectionList4: Basic usage analytics to improve the platform
privacy.dataCollectionText2: All uploaded photos are stored securely in our database and are made publicly available on the platform to fulfill our mission of preserving Croatian heritage. By uploading content, you grant permission for it to be displayed on Vremeplov.hr.
privacy.dataProtectionText1: We take the security of your data seriously. All uploads are processed through secure connections and stored using industry-standard security measures.
privacy.dataProtectionText2: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Your data is used solely for the purpose of operating and improving Vremeplov.hr.
privacy.contentRemovalText1: If you need to remove photos or other content you've uploaded, you can request deletion by contacting us with a valid reason. We will review each request and remove content when appropriate.
privacy.contentRemovalText2: Valid reasons for content removal include:
privacy.contentRemovalList2: Privacy concerns regarding individuals in photos
privacy.contentRemovalList4: Personal or family requests for removal
privacy.privacyQuestionsText: If you have questions about this privacy policy or concerns about your data, please contact us at:
privacy.policyUpdatesText: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of Vremeplov.hr after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.gdprRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.rightAccess: Right to access your personal data
privacy.rightDelete: Right to delete your account and all associated data
privacy.rightExport: Right to export all your data
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
privacy.thirdPartyText: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.firebaseDesc: Data hosting (Server location: EU - Belgium and Netherlands)
privacy.thirdPartyNote: Each service has its own privacy policy. We do not share your data with third parties except for the services listed above.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain data for the following periods:
privacy.retentionApproved: Approved photos: Permanently (as long as the platform exists)
privacy.retentionAccount: User account data: As long as the account is active
privacy.retentionUnapproved: Unapproved photos: Automatically deleted after 90 days
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your experience:
privacy.cookiesAnalytics: Analytics cookies to track site usage
privacy.cookiesPreferences: Cookies to save your preferences (language, theme)
privacy.cookiesControl: You can control cookies in your browser settings or here on the page.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules and guidelines for using Vremeplov.hr
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Vremeplov.hr, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.
terms.contentText1: When uploading content to Vremeplov.hr, you must ensure that:
terms.contentList1: You own the rights to the photographs or have permission to share them
terms.contentList2: The content is historically accurate to the best of your knowledge
terms.contentList3: Photos are appropriate and respectful to all individuals depicted
terms.contentList4: Content does not violate any third-party rights or applicable laws
terms.contentText2: By uploading content, you grant Vremeplov.hr a non-exclusive license to display, store, and share your contributions as part of our cultural heritage preservation mission.
terms.userText1: As a user of Vremeplov.hr, you agree to:
terms.userList1: Provide accurate information when uploading photos and metadata
terms.userList2: Use the platform respectfully and not engage in harassment or inappropriate behavior
terms.userList3: Respect the privacy and dignity of individuals in historical photographs
terms.userList4: Report any content that violates these terms or appears inappropriate
terms.userList5: Not attempt to damage, disable, or impair the platform's functionality
terms.moderationText: We reserve the right to review and remove content that:
terms.moderationList1: Violates copyright or intellectual property rights
terms.moderationList3: Is not relevant to Croatian historical documentation
terms.moderationList4: Includes personal information of third parties without consent
terms.moderationWarning: Repeated violations of these guidelines may result in permanent account suspension.
terms.copyrightLiability: Vremeplov.hr does not assume responsibility for copyright issues related to uploaded images. Users are solely responsible for ensuring they have the right to use and share the content they upload.
terms.prohibitedText: The following activities are strictly prohibited on Vremeplov.hr:
terms.prohibitedList2: Sharing false or misleading historical information
terms.prohibitedList3: Uploading inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content
terms.prohibitedList4: Attempting to hack, spam, or otherwise misuse the platform
terms.availabilityText: While we strive to maintain 24/7 availability, Vremeplov.hr may occasionally be unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or technical issues. We are not liable for any inconvenience caused by temporary unavailability.
terms.liabilityText: Vremeplov.hr is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform, including but not limited to data loss, service interruptions, or inaccuracies in user-contributed content.
terms.questionsText: If you have questions about these terms of service, please contact us at
terms.termsUpdatesText: These terms may be updated from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with the Vremeplov.hr team
contact.getInTouchText: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, suggestions, or need help, we're here to assist you.
contact.ourEmail: Our dedicated email for all Vremeplov.hr inquiries
contact.whatCanWeHelp: What Can We Help You With?
contact.responseTimeText: We typically respond to all inquiries within 2-5 business days. For urgent issues (content removal or inappropriate content reports), please mark your email subject with "URGENT" and we will prioritize your request.
contact.urgentRequestsText: For urgent content removal or reporting inappropriate images, please include "URGENT" in your email subject line, and we will process it with priority.
contact.otherWaysText: While email is our primary contact method, you can also reach out through our social media channels or community forums when they become available.
contact.newsletter: Follow our development and updates by subscribing to our newsletter (coming soon)
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Vremeplov.hr
faq.q1: Why can I only upload 1 photo per day?
faq.a1: New users have a limit of 1 photo per day. After the admin approves 5 photos, you automatically get Verified status (3 photos/day). Continue contributing to unlock higher tiers: Contributor (5/day) and Power User (10/day).
faq.q2: Why hasn't my photo been published yet?
faq.a2: All photos go through manual moderation to ensure archive quality. We typically approve photos within 24-48 hours. You'll receive a notification when your photo is approved.
faq.q3: What if the admin rejects my photo?
faq.a3: Reasons may include: poor quality, not relevant to Croatia, copyrighted material, or missing information. You can re-upload with corrections.
faq.q4: Can I upload old photos from my family album?
faq.a4: YES, if you own the photos or have the owner's permission. Do not upload photos from the internet or other sources without permission.
faq.q5: What if someone uploaded my photo without permission?
faq.a5: Contact us at vremeplov.app@gmail.com with "URGENT" in the subject and we will remove the photo immediately.
faq.q6: Do I have to add an address when uploading?
faq.a6: NO, the address is optional. But if you add an exact address, your photo will be visible on the Memory Map.
faq.q7: I can't find my street in the search, what now?
faq.a7: Try a broader search (e.g., just the city name), or upload without an address. You can add the address in the description field.
faq.q8: How can I increase my daily limit?
faq.a8: Tier system: NEW_USER (1/day) ‚Üí Upload 5 approved photos ‚Üí VERIFIED (3/day) ‚Üí Upload 15 approved photos ‚Üí CONTRIBUTOR (5/day) ‚Üí Upload 30 approved photos ‚Üí POWER_USER (10/day)
faq.q9: Why do I need a Google account?
faq.a9: Google Sign-In provides quick and secure login without additional passwords. We do not share your data with third parties.
faq.q10: Can I delete my account and all photos?
faq.a10: YES. Contact us via email and we will process your GDPR request within 30 days. All your photos and data will be permanently deleted.
faq.a11: Securely on Google Firebase servers in the EU region (Belgium/Netherlands), in compliance with GDPR.
faq.q12: The website is slow or not working, what should I do?
faq.a12: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser. If the problem persists, contact us at vremeplov.app@gmail.com.
faq.andWeWillHelp: and we'll be happy to help!

cookies.details.gdpr.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
cookies.details.gdpr.description: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, correct or delete your data. You can withdraw your consent at any time in privacy settings.
